page.title: 08HOME LIFE/HOUSING
page.content: Beeslack High School and hopefully make new friends there,my dad has to travel to Edinburgh every week day as he teaches at a High School.My mum works as a dinner lady at school.The Chapel is one of the main attractions of Roslin.It is very intersting to visit.I am really glad I moved from Edinburgh to Roslin. HOUSING-Roslin village has a variety of houses,some of the cottages in the main street are over 200 years old, others were built in the georgian, victorian,1930's and post-war period. BILSTON-Is mainly council houses of the terraced villa type with some private housing and millers rows. LOANHEAD-Mainly council houses and scottish special housing with some private houses.The majority of houses are semi-detached villas. NIVENSKNOWE CARAVAN PARK-Opened in
